subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Defectors (Political)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati, a midmarket team with nine straight losing seasons, took a financial risk by committing $30.25 million to Aroldis Chapman, a hard-throwing 21-year-old.
snippet: Cincinnati, a midmarket team with nine straight losing seasons, took a financial risk by committing $30.25 million to Aroldis Chapman, a hard-throwing 21-year-old.
